meanings.sent1: The scapose flower had a long stem.
meanings.sent2: The scapose plants in the garden were tall and slender.
meanings.sent3: The scapose daisy tried to reach the sun but couldn't quite make it.
meanings.sent4: Her scapose hair flowed down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The scapose tree stood proudly against the blue sky.

meanings.sent1: The scapose stem of the mushroom was sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The scapose leaves of the plant swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The scapose caterpillar stretched out to reach the juicy leaves.
meanings.sent4: The scapose branches of the tree intertwined like a dance.
meanings.sent5: The scapose vine climbed up the wall with determination.

meanings.sent1: The scapose structure of the building was elegant.
meanings.sent2: The scapose antennas of the insect were sensitive to vibrations.
meanings.sent3: The scapose robot reached out its arm to pick up the object.
meanings.sent4: The scapose fingers of the statue seemed to beckon visitors.
meanings.sent5: The scapose tail of the lizard helped it balance on the branch.
